pr_title: Enforces sampled field must be well formed

timeline.message:
Enforces sampled field must be well formed

Currently, we restart the trace if the identity fields: traceId and
spanId are malformed. This restarts on malformed sampled flag. Formerly,
we treated malformed the same as an explicit sampled=false decision.

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps : '{0}' with quotes - IIUC empty string will also log so if it just logs as empty it's tricky to read the log. But either's fine.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText:
good idea.. in this case I'll put the whole thing in single quotes as was aiming for header format.
Ex. X-B3-Sampled:  in the case of empty string
